item.description:
Live music, special grille menu, drink specials and a great outdoor patio!  !!!! Under a Tent!!!!!

More info. here - http://danversport.blogspot.com/

I'll put a Green or Purple Ballon on the back of my chair. Also, feel free to ask the hostess where you can find "Maria's Meetup".

Contact info, in case you can't find us or you'll be late. 

Cell: 978-239-0963

We're still on.  Rain or Shine!  Looking forward to seeing everyone.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll put a Green or Purple (depending on which color I can get) Ballon on the back of my chair.
item.name: Danversport Yacht Club Patio Party! Under a Tent if it rains!
